Headline: Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier track switching problem near Clark/Lake. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier track switching problem near Clark/Lake

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier track switching problem near Clark/Lake. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier track switching problem near Clark/Lake. 

 Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
